column1: Little Goat Diner////Let's talk about the food for a minute
column3: what was described to me as a blue plate special
column7: it was that good.  To begin with
column8: there was a goat hot dog.  Of course it was goat
column9: what else would I expect at a place called Little Goat Diner?  That goat hot dog was then wrapped in a very large
column11: pancake.  As if it couldn't get any better
column12: that was then topped with two eggs
column13: cooked to perfection.  Just when I thought it couldn't get any better
column14: the entire plate was then covered with a maple barbecue syrup.  YES. PLEASE.  It was divine.  My mouth still waters when I think about it.
